name: Return of Tiana
description:
Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • J - Shoot
  • K - Bomb / Dash
  • Space - Jump
Buttons on your screen:

In the bottom-left corner of your screen, from left to right:

  1. Mute / Unmute
  2. Toggle screen shaking
  3. Restart current level (room)
  4. Restart current level (room) as [Green cat] (May trigger issues, not tested much)
Some hints

How to finish the game (if you think you are just about to finish the game but you don't know how; spoiler alert): https://pastebin.com/a9t0sVDy

Issues
  • There are plenty of berries missing due to some last-minute issues, therefore some maps partially lost their fun ... Later, we will upload images for berry positions (maybe you can get them if you are lucky).
  • The score cannot be properly displayed at the end ... That's really sad but ;-;; please enjoy!
  • Some enemies move randomly and that can break certain mechanisms.
  • Sometimes the screen is truncated. Resetting the zoom level might help (especially with high DPI settings).
Credits

Ultimate 2D Controller by Matthew-J-Spencer
8x8 1bit Dungeon Tilemap by PixelHole
PixelMix font by Andrew Tyler
